nodes.text: The Aparo sector was a sector located on the Outer Rim of the galaxy. It was adjacent to the Wyl sector and the Corporate Sector. Planets within Aparo sector included Cadomai Prime.

At the time of the Great Galactic War, the Sith Empire made its opening moves against the Galactic Republic and conquered the worlds in the Aparo sector long before Republic reinforcements had even arrived.
During the reign of the Galactic Empire, Catarlo was governed by Moff Wyrrhem.
